channel.title: CVE Feed for EMC -- RepliStor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EMC -- RepliStor

item.title: CVE-2009-1120|2024-08-07T05:04:48.237Z -- emc -- replistor
item.description: EMC RepliStor Server Service before ESA-09-003 has a DoASOCommand Remote Code Execution Vulnerability. The flaw exists within the DoRcvRpcCall RPC function -exposed via the rep_srv.exe process- where the vulnerability is caused by an error when the rep_srv.exe handles a specially crafted packet sent by an unauthenticated attacker.
